title: Relaxed Coastal Escape in Metung, VIC
description: Head out on an Aussie road trip to Metung, a coastal village in Victoria’s Gippsland Lakes. Stay at Metung Holiday Villas where the whole family (including your pet dog!) can enjoy a relaxed stay in a self-contained villa with easy access to everything this charming village has to offer.

title: Relaxed Coastal Escape for Groups or Families
description: Head out on an Aussie road trip to Metung, a coastal village in Victoria’s Gippsland Lakes. Stay at Metung Holiday Villas for two, three or five nights and enjoy a relaxing stay for the whole family (pets included) or group of friends in a self-contained villa with easy access to everything this charming village has to offer. Includes a welcome bottle of red or white wine on arrival and a convenient late checkout.
